Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Depth
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 1d4} swarms of {@creature Water Weird||Water Weirds}, provided that the sun isn't up and there aren't more than two summon mists at the moment. The called creatures arrive immediately, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action. The summoned creatures have 5 hp instead of their normal hp.

action.name: Stupefying Touch
entries: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the start of Siren's next turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The vampire siren can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Regeneration (Vampire)
entries: The vampire siren regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire siren takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire siren's next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vampire siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire siren can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weakness (Vampire)
entries: The vampire siren has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance}. The vampire siren can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water}. The vampire siren takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart}. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire siren's heart while the vampire siren is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire siren is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}. The vampire siren takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Aquatic Vampire
entries: The Ocean does not count as flowing water for the Vampire Siren.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Vampire Siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire siren, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stupefying Touch
entries: The Vampire Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the start of Siren's next turn.

trait.name: Enigmatic Nature
entries: The loftus is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a {@spell wish} spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Barry makes any 2 attacks targeting up to 2 creatures that are in a 5 ft. wide, 60 ft. long line starting at Barrys position.

action.name: Boomerang
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If this is the second Boomerang attack against the same target this turn, this attack deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Healing Pearl
entries: A creature of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you regains 8 ({@dice 2d8}) Hit Points.

action.name: Moving Pearl
entries: A creature of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you must make a DC 15 strength saving throw. On a failed save you can pull the creature 5ft. towards or push it 5ft. away from you. A creature can choose to fail this saving throw.

resist.note: from weapons that aren't made of cold iron

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Magic cannot put the vizier to sleep.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Sidereal Vizier can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Sidereal Vizier fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Sidereal Vizier's weapon attacks are magical and do an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage (included below).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Vizier has advantage on saving throws against magic and other magical effects.

trait.name: Command Fey
entries: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the Sidereal Vizier can cast {@spell dominate monster} ({@dc 17}) at will on any fey creature or elf.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The River King makes three attacks with his longsword and/or flood blast, in any combination.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Flood Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage. A target creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and pushed up to 60 feet at the River King's choosing.

action.name: Grasping Whirlpool {@recharge 5}
entries: The River King magically creates a swirling vortex of water centered on a point he can see within 60 feet. The vortex fills a cylinder with a 10-foot radius and 15 feet high. Creatures in the area must make a successful {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe. On a successful save, the creature is pushed to the edge of the area. A {@condition restrained} creature can escape from the whirlpool by using an action to make a successful {@dc 16} Strength check. A creature that's in the whirlpool at the end of its turn takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage in addition to any effects from being unable to breathe. Creatures with a swim speed have advantage on the saving throw and the Strength check to escape. The whirlpool lasts for 1 minute or until the River King uses this ability again.

reaction.name: Blade Current
entries: When a creature within the River King's melee reach stands up from {@condition prone}, the River King can make a longsword attack on that creature with advantage.

legendary.name: Longsword
entries: The River King makes a longsword attack.

legendary.name: Flow
entries: The River King moves half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Ripple (2 Actions)
entries: The River King magically ripples like sunlight on the surface of water. Until the start of his next turn, all attacks against him have disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Sidereal Vizier's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Vizier is a 15th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The Vizier has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *He casts these spells on himself before combat.

monster.name: Clod Fighter
languages: understands the Language of its creator.

trait.name: Golem Material
entries: The Golem can be made out of a lot of different materials. Some Materials give the Golem extra abilities. The following table shows some examples.

rows: the golem gains resistance to pircing damage but vulnerability to bludgeoning damage.
the golem gains vulnerability to fire damage.
the golem can breath air and water and gains a 30 ft. swimming speed.
the golems weapon attacks deal acid damage instead of their normal damge types.

action.name: Clod Weapon
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:* {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Clod Throw
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack:* {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Frothing Rage
entries: The spree demon has advantage on attacks if it saw it's summoner make a successful attack against the same target within the last minute.

trait.name: Crazy Small Steps
entries: The spree demon can move through other creatures as if they were difficult terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spree demon makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} this way, the creature believes it has shrunk to half its normal size. All attacks against the creature do an extra 4 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

monster.name: Anathema, the undead Serpent

trait.name: Mummy Wraps
entries: As a bonus action, Anthema moves his bandages toward one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward Zaar.

trait.name: Fed by Souls
entries: Anathema regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Anathema fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the anathema has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Anathema has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Anthema makes three warhammer attacks, one of which can be replaced with a Necrotic Wraps attack.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If Anthema hits the same target twice with his staff on his turn, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the start of Anthema’s next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Wraps
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) necrotic damagedamage, the target’s Strength score is reduced by {@dice 1d2}, and the target gains a level of {@condition exhaustion}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. If a humanoid dies from this attack, two {@creature shadow||shadows} controlled by Anathema rise from the corpse.

bonus.name: Mantle of Shadows
entries: Whenever Anathema takes damage, he can create a 15-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness centered on himself. This darkness remains until dispelled or until the beginning of Anthema’s next turn.

legendaryHeader: Anathema has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy creature’s turn. He takes villain action 1 during the first round of combat, villain action 2 during the second round, and villain action 3 during the third round.

legendary.name: Villain Action 1: Summon Shades
entries: Anathema calls forth shades. A {@creature will-o'-wisp} appears in an unoccupied space next to each enemy within 30 feet of Zaar that he can see. These will-o’-wisps act immediately when summoned, then immediately after Anthema on the same initiative count, and fight until they’re destroyed. They follow Anthema’s commands and disappear if he dies.

legendary.name: Villain Action 2: Call Unto Death
entries: A draining pulse emits from Anathema. Any creature that is not undead within 30 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}. If the target is within 5 feet of Anathema, it makes this saving throw with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Villain Action 3: Reaper
entries: Souls surge from Anathema to pull the living into undeath. Any creature that is not undead within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save and gaining a level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn’t gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}. A humanoid slain by this villain action that is not brought back to life before the start of its next turn rises as a {@creature wight} under Anathema’s control.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Magic cannot put the Monarchon to sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Monarchon has advantage on saving throws against magic and other magical effects.

trait.name: Command Fey
entries: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the Monarchon can cast {@spell dominate monster} ({@dc 15}) at will on any fey creature or elf.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Hypnotic Display
entries: The Monarchon spreads her wings and their false eyes pulsate with a rainbow of colors, targeting one creature she can see within 30 feet. If the target can see the Monarchon, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the Monarchon's next turn. The {@condition charmed} target is {@condition stunned}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the Monarchon's gaze for 24 hours.

action.name: Hypnotic Stop (1/Day)
entries: The Monachron uses it's Hypnotic Display at all enemies within 80 ft. of it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The monarchon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). The monarchon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Monarchon is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The Monarchon has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vine troll skeleton regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it is within 10 feet of the duskthorn dryad's vines and it hasn't taken acid or fire damage since its previous turn. The skeleton dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate, or if the duskthorn dryad who created it dies, or if the troll's heart inside the dryad's or treant's tree is destroyed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.
{@i These troll skeletons are completely covered in mold and wrapped in flowering vines, and lurk in the shadows of dead tree and profaned groves.}

entries.name: Black Earth Magic
entries: Vine troll skeletons guard duskthorn dryad glades and the sacred circles of druids; others serve the vila or even moss lurker colonies as guardians. In each case, they were created by dark earth magic for a purpose, and that energy empowers great strength and endurance—but little in the way of wits.

entries.name: Constant Regrowth
entries: Their vines regenerate quickly, even after they die. Their powerful regeneration allows vine troll skeletons to reattach severed limbs. Only fire or acid can destroy them and render the living vines harmless.

entries.name: Bound to a Tree's Heart
entries: Vine troll skeletons are direct offshoots of the main vine wrapped around a duskthorn dryad's tree, a treant, or a weeping treant. Vine troll skeletons are mindless aside from a desire to defend their parent tree, and enchanted troll hearts inside the tree provide their power. Destroying the heart at the center of the tree kills the skeleton bound to that heart instantly.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when aubrey hits with it. (included in the attacks)

trait.name: Berserker Fortitude (2/Day)
entries: If damage reduces aubrey to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, aubrey drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: Aubrey has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The berserker makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the berserker can make one melee weapon attack with advantage against the attacker.

reaction.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: When a creature the berserker can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the berserker, the berserker can intimidate it. If the creature can see the berserker, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of berserker's next turn.

bonus.name: Hit Them NOW! (1/Day)
entries: Every ally of Aubrey can make one free weapon attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two silver greatsword attacks.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

action.name: Another World (1/Day)
entries: Vran targets two of his enemies within 60 feet of him. Both must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or swap character sheets until they finish a long rest.

action.name: Flay {@recharge 5}
entries: Vran blasts pure psionic energy from its eyes, frying the brains of all creatures in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Forget
entries: Vran points at one creature within 60 ft. of him and chooses a Weapon. The target has to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. If the target fails, it can't add its proficiency bonus to attack rolls made with the specified weapon until the end of it's next turn.

reaction.name: Elsewhere
entries: When a creature hits Vran with a weapon attack, the creature has to make a {@dc 15} inteligence saving throw or be teleportet up to 15 feet away.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If avelin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, avelin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Once per turn, avelin deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of avelin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and avelin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 600/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Surprise Attack (1/Day)
entries: Avalin can choose up to 5 willing creatures within  400 ft. of her. and teleport them to a space up to 60 ft. away from her.

bonus.name: Through the Shadows
entries: Avalin casts the {@spell misty step} spell.

monster.name: Zolin

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zolin is an 16th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Zolin can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following cleric spells prepared:
footerEntries: Zolin uses spells Marked with * before battle on himself.

trait.name: Zeal of the Pahraoh (2/Day)
entries: When zolin rolls fire or thunder damage, he can deal maximum damage instead of rolling.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the nullifier fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Supress Magic {@recharge 5} (From magic Item).
entries: Zolin targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the nullifier is on a different plane than the item or dies, or until the nullifier uses a bonus action to end the effect.

legendary.name: Cast a Cantrip
entries: Zolin casts 1 cantrip

legendary.name: Club Attack
entries: Zolin Makes a Club Attack.

legendary.name: Self Service
entries: Zolin casts a spell targeting only himself.

legendaryHeader: Zolin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Zolin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

trait.name: Blade Flourish (1/Turn)
entries: When brianna hits with an attack on her turn, she can use one of the following options.

items.name: Defensive Flourish.
items.entry: Brianna rolls {@dice 1d8} and adds the amount to the damage of her attack. She also adds this amount to her AC until the start of her next turn.

items.name: Mobile Flourish.
items.entry: Brianne rolls {@dice 1d8} and adds the amount to the damage of her attack. Additionally, brianna pushes her target a number of feet equal to 5 + the amount rolled. Brianna can then move up to her speed.

items.name: Slashing Flourish.
items.entry: Brianna chooses a creature within 5 feet of her original target. Both targets take an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brianna is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). she knows the following bard spells.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Brianna makes three attacks with her rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Warren is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Warren has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Formation Tactics
entries: Warren has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while he is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

trait.name: Pure Acid Magic
entries: Every spell Warren casts, that deals damage, deals acid damage instead of it's normal damage type.

trait.name: Acid Touch
entries: As a bonus action, Warren can expend a spell slot to cause his melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Warren expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Warren makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Acidic Words
entries: When a creature that Warren can see within 60 feet of him makes an attack roll, warren can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtracting the number rolled from the creature's roll. The creature is immune if it can't hear warren or if it's immune to being charmed.

reaction.name: Resistance Melding {@recharge 6}
entries: When a creature that Warren can see within 60 feet of him makes an attack roll, warren can use acidic mists to weaken the target. If the target is not resistant to acid damge, it looses all of it's resistances for this attack.

monster.name: Hell Crusher
languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The Hell Crusher can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The Hell Crusher sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Jump
entries: If the Hell Crusher moves at least 30 feet in a straight line, it can clear a distance of up to 60 feet when jumping over a chasm, ravine, or other gap. Each foot it clears on the jump costs a foot of movement.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency.
entries: If the Hell Crusher falls {@condition prone}, it can't right itself and is {@condition incapacitated} until pulled upright.

trait.name: Stunt
entries: On its turn, the driver of the Hell Crusher can expend 10 feet of movement to perform one free vehicle stunt, such as a wheelie or a burnout. Before the stunt can be performed, the Hell Crusher must move at least 10 feet in a straight line. If the driver succeeds on a DC 10 Dexterity check using the bike's Dexterity, the stunt is successful. Otherwise, the driver is unable to perform the stunt and can't attempt another stunt until the start of its next turn. If the check fails by 5 or more, the Hell Crusher and all creatures riding it immediately fall {@condition prone} as the bike wipes out and comes to a dead stop.

action.name: Wheel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: If the Hell Crusher is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Hell Crusher advantage on a Dexterity saving throw.

trait.name: Runby
entries: The rat doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it dashes out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Ward Bond
entries: As a bonus action, the celestial rat forms a magical bond with a willing creature within 5 feet. Afterward, no matter how great the distance between them, the rat knows the distance and direction to its bonded ward and is aware of the creature's general state of health. The bond lasts until the rat or the ward dies, or the rat ends the bond as an action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage, and the target must make a successful {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage at the start of its turn. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Searing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The rat exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Creatures in the area take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, or half damage with a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw.

reaction.name: Bonded Savior
entries: When the rats bonded ward takes damage, the rat can transfer the damage to itself instead. The rats damage resistance and immunity don't apply to transferred damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the vine remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a viny bush.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and a Medium or smaller target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the blight can't restrict another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: The vine shoots a magical eye ray, choosing one  target it can see within 60 feet of it. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage. The type of the damage is decided by the roll of a {@dice d4}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The drake can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The dragon's attacks are magical.

trait.name: Sticky Secretions
entries: When the spider drake is hit with a melee attack, the attacker’s weapon becomes stuck to the web fluid secreted from its scales. If the attacker didn’t use a weapon, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained} in the webbing. As an action, a creature can make a {@dc 16} Strength check, escaping or freeing its weapon from the secretions on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 2d20 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the dragon can't constrict another target.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 15} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect also ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Styx Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales stupefying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its Intelligence score reduced by 2 until it takes a long rest. If a creature's Intelligence is reduced to 0, the creature is {@condition stunned} until it regains at least one point of Intelligence.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nullifier’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 20}, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The nullifier can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The nullifier is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The train has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the nullifier fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Disruption
entries: The nullifier reaches out to touch a creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be touched. The nullifier’s touch causes a rupture of space to erupt from within the creature, dealing 22 {@damage 4d10} force damage and ending the effects of one spell on the target of 5th level or lower. The nullifier regains {@dice 1d8} hit points for each spell level of any effects it ends in this manner.

action.name: Gravity Well {@recharge 5}
entries: The nullifier creates a gravity well centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Creatures within 30 feet of the well must make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failure, they take 36 {@damage 8d8} force damage and are pulled 20 feet toward the center of the well. On a success, they take half the amount and aren’t pulled.

action.name: Supress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The nullifier targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the nullifier is on a different plane than the item or dies, or until the nullifier uses a bonus action to end the effect.

reaction.name: Spell Vitalization
entries: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the nullifier, the nullifier can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one disruption attack against a target of its choice.

Arcane nullifiers are an elevated learning construct, one originally intended to learn an opponent’s tactics and offensive strategy and to learn to counter it. Arcane nullifiers eventually learned to recognize their situation and their use, and learned to counter even will of their creators, escaping to begin a new life for their kind among the outer planes.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Skull Stealer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage. Whenever the pit fiend reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul of the creature is trapped in this sword and it can only be restored to life by a wish spell. When this happens, the pit fiend gets temporary hitpoints equal to the maximum hitpoints of the slain creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

trait.name: Magical Fists
entries: Izel's unarmed strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: Izel can use her reaction to deflect or catch the missile when you are hit by a ranged weapon attack. When you do so, the damage you take from the attack is reduced by {@dice 2d10 + 14}
If she reduces the damage to 0, she can catch the missile if she has at least one hand free. If she catch a missile in this way, she can make a ranged weapon attack to throw the projectile back.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Izel Makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Breath Robbing Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ankle Cutter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/100 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used normaly. If used as part of the Deflect Missile reaction the attack does the same damage it would have normaly made.

action.name: Locking Target
entries: Izel points her finger at a creature she can see. Any creature that is holding a ranged weapon can use it's reaction to make a ranged weapon attack against the creature pointed at.

trait.name: Master of the Ring
entries: Haluk gets advantage on contested athletics checks.

action.name: Tooth Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Billowing Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5ft. back.

reaction.name: No you.
entries: When a creature fails to grapple, push or knock {@condition prone} Haluk, Haluk can imediately attempt the same action on that creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Godwin is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight. If it can't transform, it is destroyed. While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
Forbiddance.* The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
Harmed by Running Water.* The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart.* The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.* The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Misty Way
entries: The vampire can cast the *misty step* spell. After Misty stepping next to a creature, the vampire can immediately try to grapple that creature as a free action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes three attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw}  +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}({@dice 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus ({@dice 2d6})necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0

action.name: Frost Shortswor
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage + 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage, and the target has to make a {@dc 15} constitution saving throw or has his speed reduced to 0 until the end of it's next turn. While a creatures speed is reduced in this way it also can't take reactions

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 13 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage + 10 ({@damage 2d8}) poion damage, and the target has to make a constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creatures Strength score reduces by 1. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or Long Rest.

reaction.name: Misty Movemen
entries: When Alyssia is hit with an Attack, she can use her reaction to move up to her movement speed. After this movement Alyssia can't be farther away from the attacker than she was before it.
Special Actions

reaction.name: Calling the Swarm
entries: When Alyssia rolls initiative she can summon 2 {@creature Vampire Bats|BMHS|Vampire Bats} within 30 feet of her. The Bats act right after Alyssias turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Jungle' Spellcasting ability is Wisdom (Spell save {@dc 18}). The Jungle can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Sentinels Tracking
entries: The Jungle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell while tracking outsiders.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The Jungle can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Jungle makes up to 5 thorn whip attacks at once, using the same attack roll.

action.name: Thorn Whip
entries: {@atk mw} +8 to hit, reach 25ft., one target. *Hit*  22 ({@dice 4d8 + 4}) slashing and 7 ({@dice 1d6 + 4})

trait.name: Rocky Back
entries: While the Rock Crab does not move, it is indistiguishable from a normal rock.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock Throw
entries: Range Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock Pillars
entries: Within 80 ft. of the crab up to 3 solid pillars of stone shoot up from the ground. The Pillar is 50 ft.(1 percentile dice) high. All creatures in the space of the pillars must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take  18 ({@dice 4d8}) magical bludgeoning damage or half as much on a successful one. Additionally a creature who fails its save is knocked {@condition prone} on top of the pillar while a creature who succeded can choose a space 5ft. away to stand now. If no souch space is available the creatures save counts as failed.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn 't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The muk's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save dc 13). It can innatley cast the following spells requiring no components: 5/day any: stinking cloud, acid arrow (at level 5), bane (at level 5)

trait.name: Amorpheus
entries: The muk can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Poison Touch
entries: Whenever the Muk does a successful melee attack, the target has to make a {@dc 12} constitution savin throw, on a failed save, the target is {@condition poisoned} for 10 minutes.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Whenever someone enters within 5ft of the muk, he has to make a dc 10 constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 round

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 5({@dice 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rw} +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}The Target has to make a {@dc 15} Dexterity Saving throw, taking 21({@dice 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save and half as mouch on a successful one.

trait.name: Omnipresent
entries: The Cherry Tree can not be surprised or flanked.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If its counterpart in the other plane still exists, a destroyed tree regrows in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within the same space, where its counterpart in the other plane is placed.

trait.name: Strong Roots
entries: Every creature {@condition grappled} by the tree takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage at the beginning of each of the trees turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Cherry Tree can make three attacks per turn. Each action can be used multiple times.

action.name: Blossom Projectiles
entries: Range Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. *Hit* 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sweat Scent
entries: All creatures within 30 ft. of the Tree make a {@dc 13} wisdom saving throw, or be {@condition charmed} for 5 hours. If a creature that is already Charmed fails a saving throw for this attack again, it falls to sleep. A sleeping creature is {@condition incapacitated} and knocked {@condition prone}, it can be awoken by using one action. Also if the creature is attacked, it can make a {@dc 13} wisdom save to wake up.

action.name: Root Grip
entries: Two Creatures within 60ft. of the Tree must Make a {@dc 13} dexterity saving throw, or be {@condition grappled} by it.

legendary.name: Earthquake
entries: All creatures within 60 ft. of the tree must Make a {@dc 13} dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and beeing knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save. On a successful safe, the creature only takes half damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. Creatures {@condition grappled} by the tree automaticaly fail this safe.

legendary.name: Blossom Rain
entries: The tree makes a Blossom Projectile attack.

legendary.name: Pollen Explosion (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The tree releases defensive pollen that knock out enemys. It can only use this reaction if it's Hit Points are below half. Every Creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 13} wisdom saving throw or have their hit points reduced to 0 and fall unconcious. On a successful save, the creature takes 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) psychic damage and, if on the trees next turn, is still within 30 feet of it, falls unconcious.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Ifil fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Devastating Tremor
entries: Every time that Ifil moves, each creature that is within 60 feet of it and standing on the ground must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ifil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Ifil's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Ifil deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Death Smog
entries: Ifil secretes death smog from its body. Every 10 feet Ifil moves, it leaves this smog in a unoccupied 5-foot area. Each creature that enters the area or starts its turn in that area must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw, or take 20 ({@damage 8d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ifil can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes four attacks: two with its claws and two with its stomps.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +19 to hit, reach 15ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} +19 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}40 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ominous Pulse
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of it and standing on the ground must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save they take 40 ({@damage 10d6}) force damage and are knocked {@condition prone}; those that succeed only take half as much damage and are not knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Revive Dead
entries: Each creature that is dead within 120 feet of it that is not a Plant, Ooze or Construct is resurected as an undead without their Multiattack, Tags and Legendary Actions/Resistances. The revived creatures serve Ifil and do everything to protect him.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Ifil's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if Ifil is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Ifil's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Frightful Counter
entries: Any time Ifil is targeted by a non magical melee attack, Ifil can use it's reaction to be unaffected, and half the damage that is dealt is returned to the original attack source. Ifil then follows up with one fist attack on the attacker.

reaction.name: Deadly Blood
entries: Any time Ifil is targeted by a melee attack, Ifil can use it's reaction to spray some of its blood in a 10 ft. radius around the attacker. Anyone in that area takes 10 ({@damage 1d20}) Acid damage and 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Necrotic Damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Ifil moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Ifil makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Tail Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Ifil flings its tails around. Each creature within 15 feet of Ifil must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Ifil must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lot's of Heroe
entries: While the Heroic Battle has more than half of it's hit points, it can attack every Creature within range once per turn.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The heroic battle can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the heroic battle can move through any opening large enough for a medium humanoid. The heroic battle can't regain hp or gain temporary hp.

action.name: Melee Weapon Attack
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, range 0 ft., one target in the heroic battle's space. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d4 + 6}) bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, or 8 ({@dice 2d4 + 3}) if the heroic battle has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Ranged Weapon Attack
entries: {@atk rw} +3 to hit, range 20/40 ft., {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) bludgeoning or piercing damage, or 5 ({@dice 2d4}) if the heroic battle has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Magic AOE
entries: One creature within the Heroic Battle has to make a {@dc 13} DEX saving throw or take {@dice 4d4} fire, cold, thunder lighting, acid or poison damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Magic Attack
entries: {@atk rw} +3 to hit, range 20/40 ft., {@h}10 ({@dice 4d4}) fire, cold, thunder lighting, acid or poison damage, or 5 ({@dice 2d4}) if the heroic battle has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Trip
entries: One creature within the Heroic Battle has to make a {@dc 14} DEX or STR saving throw (Creatures Choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take {@damage 2d4} bludgeoning damage or half as much on a successful save.

trait.name: Liquid Courage
entries: Recharge 5-6). As a bonus action, the tavern brawl imbibes nearby alcohol to gain access to a hidden reservoir of audacity and grit. The tavern brawl gains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hp for 1 minute.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The tavern brawl can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the tavern brawl can move through any opening large enough for a medium humanoid. Except for Liquid Courage, the tavern brawl can't regain hp or gain temporary hp.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tavern brawl makes weapon attacks.

action.name: Chair
entries: {@atk mw} +4 to hit, range 0 ft., one target in the tavern brawl's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) if the tavern brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Broken Bottles
entries: {@atk mw} +3 to hit, range 0 ft., one target in the tavern brawl's space. {@h}17 ({@damage 6d4 + 2}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@dice 3d4 + 1}) if the tavern brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Flying Debris
entries: {@atk rw} +3 to hit, range 20/40 ft., {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@dice 2d4}) if the tavern brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Slippery Fella
entries: Herpes is unaffected by difficult terrain and his movement can't be reduced in any way.

trait.name: Hi. Bye
entries: At the beginning of it's fourth turn, Herpes will disapear completly, exclaiming that he will be back when he is needed most.

trait.name: No Touchy
entries: When another creature touches Herpes, it needs to make a {@dc 15} Con Saving throw or contract a random desease from the table below ({@dice 1d10}). The deasese Lasts for 30 days or can be healed by anything that can heal diseases.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Herpes makes 3 attacks.

action.name: Lil Nibble
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage and the target touches Herpes.

action.name: Rolling Alround
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* The target Takes {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage for every rollout Herpes made in sequence and touches Herpes. Additionaly a creature that is medium or smaller has to make a {@dc 10} Con save or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Charge Attack
entries: The worm moves up to 40ft. in a straight line towards a target. It makes a Bite attack against any creature in it's path and the target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns.

If the wormling takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Cloud
entries: The worm spits on a point within 60 ft. and in a 10ft. Radius a cloud of acidic gas appears. Every creature in range has to make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spiderling can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spiderling knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spiderling ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Froststrin
entries: {@atk rw} +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and it's movement speed is reduced by 10 ft. until the end of it's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Spiderling Sac
entries: When the Frostsilk spider is reduced below half of it's Hit Points, up to 4 {@creature Frostsilk Spiderling|BMHS|Frostsilk Spiderlings} Crawl out of her onto free spaces within 5 ft. of her.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Frostsilk Spider makes one Bite attack and two Froststring Attacks or replaces one of the Froststring attacks with a Frostweb.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 8 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Frostweb {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} +10 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature takes 20 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 15} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 12; hp 10; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, cold, poison, and psychic damage).

action.name: Froststring
entries: {@atk rw} +10 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target takes 13 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and it's movement speed is reduced by 15 ft. until the end of it's next turn.

trait.name: Angry
entries: If the Beast takes more than 15 damage in one attack all creatures inside its cage are expelled onto a free space around the Beast.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Beast makes one claw attack and one grab or cuddle attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grab
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one medium or smaler creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Cuddle
entries: Choose 1 creature that the Beast is grappling The beast pulls it into its cage. While inside the cage any creature is {@condition restrained} and takes the same damage as the beast except for psychic damage and damage that is caused from inside the cage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two shot attacks.

action.name: Shot
entries: {@atk rw} +7 to hit, reach 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

Psionics

trait.name: Feedback Aura
entries: Each time the dragon takes damage, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or else take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic or fire damage (your choice).

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: Obsidian dragons have the innate ability to pass instantly between the Material Plane and the Inner Planes, where they often make their homes.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus ({@dice 2d6})fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 ft. of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detec
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Psionics
entries: The dragon uses a {@filter psionic ability|optionalfeatures|feature type=Psi. Man.}.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Shift (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon releases a wave of telekinetic energy from its mind. Every creature within 15 feet must make a {@dc 24} Intelligence saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) force damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon then can move up to half its movement speed.

trait.name: Worms
entries: If the Autophage is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, it withers away.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Autophage makes two attacks with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm or uses two Burroring Worms.

action.name: Burrowing Worm
entries: A worm launches from the Autophage at one humanoid that the Autophage can see within 10 feet of it.

The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny monstrosity with AC 6, l hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of {@dice 10d6}). A worm-in-

fested target dies if it drops to O hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as an Autophage. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 (l{@dice d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Reaction

action.name: Feed
entries: When a creature within 40 feet of the Scorpion dies, it can run to the position and capture the soul of the creature, to add to its collection. Also, the Scorpion can choose to start feeding on the corpse gaining 7 ({@dice 2d6}) HP. If the Scorpion chooses to feed He is {@condition restrained} until the end of it's next turn.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 +the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point in stead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Fowl Appearance
entries: While the creature remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal chicken.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. The soul inhabits another creature within 30 feet ({@dc 20} Cha saving throw). While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Enormous Nose
entries: This creature gains advantage on any check involving putting things in its nose.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psyonic Beam
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it.The target must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Psychic Damage.

monster.name: Ceramics Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 30 hp or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, usually an object smaller than itself. When the golem attacks while in Berserk mode, his Chipping abillity triggers. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to attack until it is destroyed or it regains all its hp.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The ceramics golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ceramics golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The ceramics golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Chipping
entries: Whenever the golem takes damage, he sprays ceramic chippings around him. All creatures within 5 ft. of the golem have to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity Saving throw or Take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing Damage not exceding the damage that caused this abillity to trigger.

trait.name: Construct Nature
entries: A golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two attacks.

action.name: Pumble
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:{@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Chip Shot
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

feat.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
entries: You grow black Raven wings.

You gain the ability to sprout a pair of raven wings from your back, gaining a flying speed equal to your current speed. You can create these wings as a bonus action on your turn. They last until you dismiss them as a bonus action on your turn or until you fall unconcious.
You can use this ability once per Long Rest.

feat.name: Radiant Emissary

prerequisite.other: Bestowed upon you by a Celestial

entries: A celstial entity has chosen you as one of it's champions. You gain the following benefits:

entries.name: Light Bearer
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Radiant Soul
entries: You have resistance to radiant damage

entries.name: Blazing Fury
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can do an additional {@damage 1d6} radiant damage.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

legendaryGroup.name: Madtrip
lairActions: When fighting inside its lair, a Madtrip can invoke the ambient magic to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the Madtrip can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: An area that is a 50-foot cube within 120 feet of the tyrant is filled with voracious fungi. To creatures other than the Madtrip, that area is lightly obscured and difficult terrain until initiative count 20 on the next round.

2 {@creature Gas Spore||Gas Spores} arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the Madtrip. The {@creature Gas Spore||Gas Spores} act right after the Madtrip on the same initiative count and fight until they’re destroyed.

A spectral eye opens in the air at a point within 50 feet of the Madtrip. One random spore ray of the Madtrip shoots from that eye, which is considered to be an ethereal source, at a target of the Madtrip’s choice. The eye then closes and disappears.

lairActions: The Madtrip can’t repeat an effect until all three have been used, and it can’t use the same effect on consecutive rounds.
regionalEffects: A region containing a death tyrant’s lair is warped by the creature’s unnatural presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Noxious smells waft from 10 miles from the Madtrip's lair causing serve nausea and vomiting (DC 17 Constitution) from creatures that breathe the gas.

All plant life wither within 5 miles of the Madtrip's lair and the dense gases blot out the sun. The rotting twisted swamp is terraformed perfectly for Underdark fungi ({@creature Gas Spore||Gas Spores}, {@creature Shrieker||Shriekers}, and {@creature Violet Fungus||Violet Fungi}) to thrive.

When a creature hostile to the tyrant and aware of its existence finishes a long rest within 1 mile of the tyrant’s lair, roll a d20 for that creature. On a roll of 10 or lower, the creature is subjected to one random spore ray of the Madtrip.

regionalEffects: If the Madtrip dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

spell.name: Sozaha's Miniature Sun
entries: A 5-inch-diameter Miniature Sun appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the Duration.

When you cast the spell, and as an action on all subsequent turns, you can make two melee spell attacks against a creature within 15 feet of the sun. On a hit, the target takes fire damage equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the Sun up to 40 feet. If you ram the Sun into a creature or object, it explodes, ending the spell. Every ceature within 10 ft. of the impact point, has to make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 6d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The sun sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

spell.name: Lashana's Avascular Mass
